Text saved: People tell us this. Our biology does not tell us this. They say girls should like arts. They say boys should like maths and physics.

A scientist is a person who studies science. They learn about how the world works. A role model is a person you look up to. You want to be like them. Young people do not see many good women scientists. They do not see many women in science jobs.

Books and films often show male scientists. They are strange. They are very clever. They go to space.

People also think scientists are strange. They think scientists are not good at talking to people. They think scientists work alone. They think scientists are not with other people.

These ideas are wrong. Films and TV show them. This can mean girls do not feel like scientists. They do not see science as a good job.

If girls saw more good women scientists, they would feel better. They would feel they fit in these school subjects.
Feedback received: Grade 3/10 - FAIL
